PRE-RECORDED POWERPOINT PRESENTATION OF THE TOPIC - DUE END OF WEEK 10 

Students will prepare a 10 minute pre-recorded video from their paper using Zoom.  This will require the preparation of slides using PowerPoint.  The bullet points for peer review of the paper (described in the instructions for the final paper assignment) may be helpful in preparing the slides. class="icon-star" title="Preparing Your Meeting to Recording a Presentation.pdf" href="/courses/18761/files/6916982/download?wrap=1" "https://canvas.eee.uci.edu/api/v1/courses/18761/files/6916982" "File">Instructions for Recording a Presentation in ZOOM

PRE-RECORDED POWERPOINT PRESENTATION OF THE TOPIC - DUE END OF WEEK 10 

Students will prepare a 10 minute pre-recorded video from their paper using Zoom.  This will require the preparation of slides using PowerPoint.  The bullet points for peer review of the paper (described in the instructions for the final paper assignment) may be helpful in preparing the slides. class="icon-star" title="Preparing Your Meeting to Recording a Presentation.pdf" href="/courses/18761/files/6916982/download?wrap=1" "https://canvas.eee.uci.edu/api/v1/courses/18761/files/6916982" "File">Instructions for Recording a Presentation in ZOOM

assignment_desc:
class="btn icon-replied" title="Week 1 Road Map" href="/courses/18761/pages/week-1-road-map" "https://canvas.eee.uci.edu/api/v1/courses/6064/pages/week-1-road-map" >Week 1 Road Map "background-color: #58b8d4; padding: 2px;"> "background-color: #e4f4f8; padding: 10px;">

PRE-RECORDED POWERPOINT PRESENTATION OF THE TOPIC - DUE END OF WEEK 10 

Students will prepare a 10 minute pre-recorded video from their paper using Zoom.  This will require the preparation of slides using PowerPoint.  The bullet points for peer review of the paper (described in the instructions for the final paper assignment) may be helpful in preparing the slides. class="icon-star" title="Preparing Your Meeting to Recording a Presentation.pdf" href="/courses/18761/files/6916982/download?wrap=1" "https://canvas.eee.uci.edu/api/v1/courses/18761/files/6916982" "File">Instructions for Recording a Presentation in ZOOM

class="btn icon-replied" title="Week 6 Road Map" href="/courses/18761/pages/week-6-road-map" "https://canvas.eee.uci.edu/api/v1/courses/18761/pages/week-6-road-map" >Week 6 Road Map "background-color: #58b8d4; padding: 2px;">  "background-color: #e4f4f8; padding: 10px;">
